11 ModelLoader::ModelLoader(pcl::PolygonMesh mesh, std::string mesh_name) :
12  ModelLoader(mesh_name)
13 {
14  this->mesh = mesh;
15 }

17 ModelLoader::ModelLoader(std::string mesh_name) :
18  QObject(0)
19 {
20  this->mesh_name = mesh_name;
21  this->setCloudResolution(960);
22  this->setPath(ros::package::getPath("qt_filter_tester") + "/trace_clouds/");
23  this->setTesselation_level(1);
24 
25 }

30 
31 void ModelLoader::populateLoader() {
32  if(!this->loadPointClouds()) {
33  if(this->mesh.cloud.data.size() == 0) {
34  ROS_ERROR("There is no defined mesh to generate clouds from");
35  return;
36  }
37  this->generatePointClouds();
38  this->savePointClouds();
39  }
40 }
41 
42 std::vector<RayTraceCloud> ModelLoader::getModels(bool load){
43  // Populate the loader if empty
44  if(load && this->ray_trace_clouds.empty()) {
45  this->populateLoader();
46  }
47 
48  return this->ray_trace_clouds;
49 }
50 
51 void ModelLoader::generatePointClouds() {
52  // Create mesh object
53  vtkSmartPointer<vtkPolyData> meshVTK;
54  pcl::VTKUtils::convertToVTK(this->mesh, meshVTK);
55 
56  // Set up trace generation
57  ROS_INFO("Generating traces...");
58  ROS_INFO("\033[32m Current settings:");
59  ROS_INFO("\033[32m -mesh_name: %s", this->mesh_name.c_str());
60  ROS_INFO("\033[32m -cloud_resolution: %d", this->cloud_resolution);
61  ROS_INFO("\033[32m -tesselation_level: %d", this->tesselation_level);
62 
63  pcl::visualization::PCLVisualizer generator("Generating traces...",false);
64  generator.addModelFromPolyData (meshVTK, "mesh", 0);
65  std::vector<pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>, Eigen::aligned_allocator<pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ> > > clouds;
66  std::vector<Eigen::Matrix4f, Eigen::aligned_allocator<Eigen::Matrix4f> > poses;
67  std::vector<float> enthropies;
68 
69  // Generate traces
70  generator.renderViewTesselatedSphere(this->cloud_resolution, this->cloud_resolution, clouds, poses, enthropies, this->tesselation_level);
71 
72  // Generate clouds
73  this->ray_trace_clouds.clear();
74  for(int i =0; i < clouds.size(); i++)
75  {
76  RayTraceCloud cloud;
77  cloud.cloud = pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr(new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>);
78  *cloud.cloud = clouds.at(i);
79  cloud.pose = poses.at(i);
80  cloud.enthropy = enthropies.at(i);
81  std::cout << "Calculating features for Cloud nr. " << i << std::endl;
82  cloud = filters->calculate_features(cloud);
83  this->ray_trace_clouds.push_back(cloud);
84  }
85 }
86 
87 bool ModelLoader::savePointClouds() {
88  if(this->ray_trace_clouds.empty()){
89  return false;
90  }
91 
92  // Set saving path
93  std::string save_path = this->path + this->mesh_name + "/";
94  ROS_INFO("Saving ray traces");
95  ROS_INFO("\tUsing %s", save_path.c_str());
96 
97  // Generate YAML node
98  YAML::Node clouds;
99  for(int i = 0; i < this->ray_trace_clouds.size(); i++) {
100  RayTraceCloud ray_trace = this->ray_trace_clouds.at(i);
101 
102  std::stringstream filename_cloud;
103  std::stringstream filename_normals;
104  std::stringstream filename_keypoints;
105  std::stringstream filename_local_descriptor;
106  std::stringstream filename_global_descriptor;
107 
108  filename_cloud << this->mesh_name << "_cloud_";
109  filename_cloud << setfill('0') << setw(4) << (i+1);
110  filename_cloud << ".pcd";
111  filename_normals << this->mesh_name << "_normals_";
112  filename_normals << setfill('0') << setw(4) << (i+1);
113  filename_normals << ".pcd";
114  filename_keypoints << this->mesh_name << "_keypoints_";
115  filename_keypoints << setfill('0') << setw(4) << (i+1);
116  filename_keypoints << ".pcd";
117  filename_local_descriptor << this->mesh_name << "_ldescriptor_";
118  filename_local_descriptor << setfill('0') << setw(4) << (i+1);
119  filename_local_descriptor << ".pcd";
120  filename_global_descriptor << this->mesh_name << "_gdescriptor_";
121  filename_global_descriptor << setfill('0') << setw(4) << (i+1);
122  filename_global_descriptor << ".pcd";
123 
124  boost::filesystem::create_directories(save_path);
125  pcl::io::savePCDFile(save_path + filename_cloud.str(), *ray_trace.cloud);
126  pcl::io::savePCDFile(save_path + filename_normals.str(), *ray_trace.normals);
127  pcl::io::savePCDFile(save_path + filename_keypoints.str(), *ray_trace.keypoints);
128  pcl::io::savePCDFile(save_path + filename_local_descriptor.str(), *ray_trace.local_descriptors);
129  pcl::io::savePCDFile(save_path + filename_global_descriptor.str(), *ray_trace.global_descriptors);
130 
131  YAML::Node node;
132  node["cloud"] = filename_cloud.str();
133  node["normals"] = filename_normals.str();
134  node["keypoints"] = filename_keypoints.str();
135  node["ldescriptor"] = filename_local_descriptor.str();
136  node["gdescriptor"] = filename_global_descriptor.str();
137  for(int j = 0; j < 16; j++) {
138  node["pose"].push_back(ray_trace.pose(j / 4, j % 4));
139  }
140  node["enthropy"] = ray_trace.enthropy;
141 
142  std::stringstream cloud_node;
143  cloud_node << setfill('0') << setw(4) << (i+1);
144  clouds[cloud_node.str()] = node;
145  }
146 
147  // Saving the YAML node
148  YAML::Emitter out;
149  out << clouds;
150  boost::filesystem::ofstream f(save_path + this->mesh_name + ".yaml");
151  f << out.c_str();
152  ROS_INFO("\033[33mSuccessfully saved %d ray traces", (int)this->ray_trace_clouds.size());
153 }
154 
155 
156 bool ModelLoader::loadPointClouds() {
157  // Set the save path
158  std::string save_path = this->path + this->mesh_name + "/";
159  YAML::Node clouds;
160 
161  // Try to load the files
162  try {
163  ROS_INFO("Loading ray trace clouds...");
164  ROS_INFO("\tUsing %s", save_path.c_str());
165  clouds = YAML::LoadFile(save_path + this->mesh_name + ".yaml");
166  }
167  catch (const std::exception& e) {
168  ROS_INFO("\033[31mFile not found.\033[0m");
169  return false;
170  }
171 
172  int i = 1;
173  std::stringstream cloud_node;
174  cloud_node << setfill('0') << setw(4) << i;
175  this->ray_trace_clouds.clear();
176 
177  // Populate ray_trace_cloud from the YAML node
178  while(clouds[cloud_node.str()]){
179  YAML::Node cloud = clouds[cloud_node.str()];
180 
181  RayTraceCloud ray_trace;
182  ray_trace.cloud = pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr(new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>);
183  ray_trace.normals = pcl::PointCloud<pcl::Normal>::Ptr(new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::Normal>);
184  ray_trace.keypoints = pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr(new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>);
185  ray_trace.local_descriptors = pcl::PointCloud<pcl::FPFHSignature33>::Ptr(new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::FPFHSignature33>);
186  ray_trace.global_descriptors = pcl::PointCloud<pcl::VFHSignature308>::Ptr(new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::VFHSignature308>);
187 
188  pcl::io::loadPCDFile(save_path + cloud["cloud"].as<std::string>(), *ray_trace.cloud);
189  pcl::io::loadPCDFile(save_path + cloud["normals"].as<std::string>(), *ray_trace.normals);
190  pcl::io::loadPCDFile(save_path + cloud["keypoints"].as<std::string>(), *ray_trace.keypoints);
191  pcl::io::loadPCDFile(save_path + cloud["ldescriptor"].as<std::string>(), *ray_trace.local_descriptors);
192  pcl::io::loadPCDFile(save_path + cloud["gdescriptor"].as<std::string>(), *ray_trace.global_descriptors);
193 
194 
195  for(int x = 0; x < 4; x++) {
196  for(int y = 0; y < 4; y++) {
197  ray_trace.pose(x, y) = cloud["pose"][(int)(x*4 + y)].as<float>();
198  }
199  }
200  ray_trace.enthropy = cloud["enthropy"].as<float>();
201  this->ray_trace_clouds.push_back(ray_trace);
202  cloud_node.clear();
203  cloud_node.str(std::string());
204  cloud_node << setfill('0') << setw(4) << ++i;
205  }
206  ROS_INFO("\033[33mSuccessfully loaded %d ray traces\033[0m", i-1);
207  return true;
208 }
209 }
